documents.document: @iseultcody Reckon it'll be a packed house? Just checked StubHub there and there's a rake of tickets up for sale.

@iseultcody @ant_crolla Crolla needs to fight Flanagan next for the title; would be a great derby fight. Hope Frank & Eddie don't take the piss and get it sorted 👍
